description:
The course aims to develop basic tools for the timely management of a business initiative by adopting the main characteristics of an entrepreneur. Upon completion the participant will have the ability to develop a work plan and business model. 

                                            Syllabus
                        Each week, experts will develop a major theme through short videos, reference materials and community forums on the Telescope.

Week 1:  Induction of the platform and community forums Telescope.
Week 2:  Investment opportunity in projects 
Week 3:  Business model and market segmentation
Week 4:  Estimated and projected sales 
Week 5:  Assessment of business plan
Final Project for course certification
title: Iniciativa Empresarial: Construyendo mi modelo de negocio
instructors: Jorge Luis Contreras and Tula Mendoza Farro
